greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter combining prime signature of n (A101296) with Dedekind's psi (A001615).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pairing Function
formula: Restricted growth sequence transform of function f(n) = (1/2)*(2 + ((A046523(n) + A001615(n))^2) - A046523(n) - 3*A001615(n)), where values A046523(n) and A001615(n) are packed together to a(n) with the 2-argument form of A000027, also known as Cantor pairing-function.
program: rgs_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), u=1); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), my(pp = mapget(om, invec[i])); outvec[i] = outvec[pp] , mapput(om,invec[i],i); outvec[i] = u; u++ )); outvec; };
A001615(n) = (n * sumdivmult(n, d, issquarefree(d)/d)); \\ This function from _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 09 2014
A046523(n) = { my(f=vecsort(factor(n)[, 2], , 4), p); prod(i=1, #f, (p=nextprime(p+1))^f[i]); };  \\ This function from _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 17 2011
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 03 2017
